Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute near Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 buses rrtd SB buses will operate via Clark, Racine, Belmont & Clark: NB buses will operate via Clark, Belmont, Racine & Clark due to concert at Wrigley Field

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Racine/Belmont, due to concert at Wrigley Field.

Southbound buses will operate via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark.

Northbound buses will operate via Clark, Belmont, Racine and Clark.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at 89th/Commercial
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 89th, Houston, 87th and Commercial due to, street blockage near 89th/Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 89th, Houston, 87th and Commercial due to, street blockage near 89th/Commercial.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line Service Delayed at Oakton-Skokie
ShortDescription: Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line trains are standing at Oakton-Skokie due to a stalled train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line trains are standing at Oakton-Skokie due to a stalled train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, such as the #97 Skokie bus, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
